languages.text: Until the beginning of the Arbitrator's next turn taget enemy gains {uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the "Death Sentence" effect. Targets under this effect have 1% increased chance to be critically hit for every stack and their Perception and Willpower are reduceed by -2 for every stack. Every time an enemy is takes damage from an attack, stacks of this effect increase by 1.

traits.locale_text: Until the beginning of the Arbitrator's next turn taget enemy gains {uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the "Death Sentence" effect. Targets under this effect have 1% increased chance to be critically hit for every stack and their Perception and Willpower are reduceed by -2 for every stack. Every time an enemy is takes damage from an attack, stacks of this effect increase by 1.

languages.text: The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
languages.original_text: Арбитр накладывает на врага +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} уровней эффекта {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}смертный приговор{/g}. Каждый уровень эффекта повышает шанс этого врага получить {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критическое попадание{/g} на 1% и уменьшает его {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятие{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Волю{/g} на 2. Получая {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} от атаки, цель под этим эффектом получает еще +1 уровень этого эффекта.{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}{/g} Эффект действует до начала следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} арбитра.

traits.locale_text: The Arbitrator inflicts {uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases that enemy's chance to be critically hit by +1% and reduces their Perception and Willpower by −2. Whenever a target with this effect suffers damage from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next turn.

The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

Until the beginning of the Arbitrator's next turn taget enemy gains {uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the "Death Sentence" effect. Targets under this effect have 1% increased chance to be critically hit for every stack and their Perception and Willpower are reduceed by -2 for every stack. Every time an enemy is takes damage from an attack, stacks of this effect increase by 1.

languages.text: Yargıcı, bir düşmanda +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}ölüm cezası{/g} etkisi birikimi oluşturur. Her bir birikim, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} maruz kalma olasılığını +%1 artırır ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerini 2 puan azaltır. Bu etki altındaki bir hedef, bir saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırsa +1 {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}ölüm cezası{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. Etki, Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında sona erer.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Yargıcı, bir düşmanda +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}ölüm cezası{/g} etkisi birikimi oluşturur. Her bir birikim, düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} maruz kalma olasılığını +%1 artırır ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerini 2 puan azaltır. Bu etki altındaki bir hedef, bir saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırsa +1 {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}ölüm cezası{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. Etki, Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında sona erer.

Yargıcı, bir düşmanda +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}ölüm cezası{/g} etkisi birikimi oluşturur. Her bir birikim, o düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruşa{/g} maruz kalma olasılığını +%1 artırır ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g} ile {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerini 2 puan azaltır. Bu etkiden muzdarip bir hedef, bir saldırıdan {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} alırsa +1 {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}ölüm cezası{/g} birikimine maruz kalır. Etki, Yargıcı'nın bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turunun{/g} başlangıcında sona erer.

languages.text: El Arbitrator inflige +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}sentencia de muerte{/g} a un enemigo. Cada acumulación incrementa en +1 % la probabilidad de que ese enemigo reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, además de reducir su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} en −2. Cada vez que un objetivo bajo este efecto sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por un ataque, recibe +1 acumulación de {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}sentencia de muerte{/g}. El efecto dura hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Arbitrator.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El Arbitrator inflige +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}sentencia de muerte{/g} a un enemigo. Cada acumulación incrementa en +1 % la probabilidad de que ese enemigo reciba un impacto crítico, además de reducir su Percepción y Voluntad en −2. Cada vez que un objetivo bajo este efecto sufra daño por un ataque, recibe +1 acumulación de {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}sentencia de muerte{/g}. El efecto dura hasta el comienzo del próximo turno del Arbitrator.

El Arbitrator inflige +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} acumulaciones del efecto {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}sentencia de muerte{/g} a un enemigo. Cada acumulación incrementa en +1 % la probabilidad de que ese enemigo reciba un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g}, además de reducir su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} en −2. Cada vez que un objetivo bajo este efecto sufra {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} por un ataque, recibe +1 acumulación de {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}sentencia de muerte{/g}. El efecto dura hasta el comienzo del próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del Arbitrator.

languages.text: 法务官对单个敌人施加{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba}层{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑宣判{/g}效果，每层效果使受影响的敌人受到{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}的几率提高1%，同时使其{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}降低2点。每当拥有此效果的敌人受到攻击{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑宣判{/g}效果增加1层。此效果持续至法务官的下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 法务官对单个敌人施加{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba}层{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑宣判{/g}效果，每层效果使受影响的敌人受到暴击的几率提高1%，同时使其感知与意志降低2点。每当拥有此效果的敌人受到攻击伤害时，{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑宣判{/g}效果增加1层。此效果持续至法务官的下个回合开始。

languages.text: L'arbitrator inflige +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} cumuls de {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Peine de mort{/g} à un ennemi. Chaque cumul augmente de +1 % les {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}chances de coup critique{/g} sur la cible et réduit sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} et sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} de −2. Quand une cible affectée subit les {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} d'une attaque, elle reçoit +1 cumul de {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Peine de mort{/g}. L'effet dure jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant de l'arbitrator.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'arbitrator inflige +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} cumuls de {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Peine de mort{/g} à un ennemi. Chaque cumul augmente de +1 % les chances de coup critique sur la cible et réduit sa Perception et sa Force mentale de −2. Quand une cible affectée subit les dégâts d'une attaque, elle reçoit +1 cumul de {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Peine de mort{/g}. L'effet dure jusqu'au début du tour suivant de l'arbitrator.

languages.text: アービトレイターは+{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba}スタックの{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑判決{/g}効果を敵に与える。1スタックにつき、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}率が+1%上昇し、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が-2低下する。この効果を持つターゲットが攻撃で {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、+1スタックの{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑判決{/g}が付与される。この効果は、アービトレイターの次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}の開始時まで継続する。
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターは+{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba}スタックの{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑判決{/g}効果を敵に与える。1スタックにつき、敵のクリティカルヒット率が+1%上昇し、認知力と意志力が-2低下する。この効果を持つターゲットが攻撃でダメージを受けると、+1スタックの{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}死刑判決{/g}が付与される。この効果は、アービトレイターの次のターンの開始時まで継続する。

languages.text: Der Arbitrator belegt den Gegner mit +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} Stapeln des {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Todesurteil{/g}-Effektes. Jeder Stapel erhöht die Chance des Gegners, einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} zu erleiden, um +1 % und reduziert seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} um -2. Erleidet ein mit diesem Effekt belegtes Ziel {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} durch einen Angriff, wird es mit +1 Stapel {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Todesurteil{/g} belegt. Der Effekt dauert bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Arbitrators an.
languages.original_text: The Arbitrator inflicts +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} stacks of the {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g} effect on an enemy. Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Arbitrator belegt den Gegner mit +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} Stapeln des {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Todesurteil{/g}-Effektes. Jeder Stapel erhöht die Chance des Gegners, einen kritischen Treffer zu erleiden, um +1 % und reduziert seine Wahrnehmung und Willenskraft um -2. Erleidet ein mit diesem Effekt belegtes Ziel Schaden durch einen Angriff, wird es mit +1 Stapel {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}Todesurteil{/g} belegt. Der Effekt dauert bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges des Arbitrators an.

Der Effekt dauert bis zum Beginn des nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zuges{/g} des Arbitrators an.

Each stack increases the enemy's chance to be {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critically hit{/g} by +1% and reduces their {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} by −2. Whenever a target under this effect suffers {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} from an attack, it suffers +1 stack of {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}death sentence{/g}. The effect lasts until the start of the Arbitrator's next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Арбитр накладывает на врага +{uip|Damage|6a4c3b65dff840e0aab5966ffe8aa7ba} уровней эффекта {g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}смертный приговор{/g}. Каждый уровень эффекта повышает шанс этого врага получить критическое попадание на 1% и уменьшает его Восприятие и Волю на 2. Получая урон от атаки, цель под этим эффектом получает еще +1 уровень этого эффекта.{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}{/g} Эффект действует до начала следующего хода арбитра.

Каждый уровень эффекта повышает шанс этого врага получить критическое попадание на 1% и уменьшает его Восприятие и Волю на 2. Получая урон от атаки, цель под этим эффектом получает еще +1 уровень этого эффекта.{g|f:f5c2bdd369324a0d9b7809782a7ae508}{/g} Эффект действует до начала следующего хода арбитра.
